dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla

dcterms:description: CARLA Leaderboard 1.0 is a benchmark designed to assess the driving proficiency of autonomous agents within realistic traffic scenarios, providing a controlled environment for testing and refining autonomous driving technologies.
dcterms:title: CARLA Leaderboard 1.0

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Elmahgiubi
K. Rezaee
B. Khamidehi

dcterms:description: CARLA Leaderboard 2.0 introduces more complex and challenging scenarios for autonomous driving, significantly increasing the difficulty level compared to its predecessor, and aims to rigorously test the adaptability of autonomous driving systems.
dcterms:title: CARLA Leaderboard 2.0

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database that serves as a benchmark for various computer vision tasks, providing a diverse set of images for training and evaluating models.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: W. G. Najm
J. D. Smith
M. Yanagisawa
dcterms:description: The NHTSA typology provides a framework for categorizing pre-crash scenarios to aid in crash avoidance research, offering insights into various driving situations and their implications for safety.
dcterms:title: NHTSA typology
